title: Detective Conan: Magician of the Silver Sky
overview: Once again, Kaitou Kid crosses swords with Conan Edogawa in this annual installment of the Detective Conan movie franchise. After receiving a letter from the thief, famous actress Juri Maki seeks the help of private detective Kogorou Mouri to protect the Star Sapphireâ€”the "Jewel of Destiny," said to represent faith, fate, and hope.
